Recode Name by FIPS

Source: R/recode.R
recode_name_fips.Rd

Replaces state fips with state name

recode_name_fips(.data, .fips)

Arguments

.data

data.frame or tibble
.fips

column with state fips

Value

.data with column .fips replaced with state name

Examples

data('stata')
stata %>% recode_name_fips(fips)

#>                           fips abb                        name    ansi
